title: Lily Serna falls pregnant with fiancé Blair Hickey as Letters And Numbers host shows off her bump
text:
Letters and Numbers presenter Lily Serna has announced she is pregnant with her first child.

The maths whizz revealed her baby joy with fiancé Blair Hickey on social media, and showed off her growing bump.

Taking to Instagram on Thursday, Lily, 32, shared an adorable photograph of herself and Blair on the slopes.

Baby joy! Blair Hickey and Lily Serna (pictured) have announced they're expecting their first child after getting engaged earlier this year

She wrote: 'So there’s one more little thing that I’ve been working most of the year that I haven’t shared with you yet... I’m very excited to say that we’re expecting a baby very soon!

'What a year it’s been with the release of my book Curious next week as well as my Catalyst episode and now a little one.

'My head is spinning but we’re over the moon!'

She's expecting! Lily is pictured clutching her bump in both hands in a revealing black dress

Wrapped up in a grey knitted jumper and a thick coat, Lily's growing bump was clearly visible.

Standing next to her in a checked shirt, dad-to-be Blair rested his hand proudly on Lily's tummy.

In another more glamorous snap, Lily was pictured clutching her bump in both hands in a revealing black dress.

The exciting news comes after Blair popped the question in January this year while the pair were on holiday in Tasmania.

Cheers! Lily said 'I do' during a romantic hiking trip after Blair surprised her on a secluded beach with a proposal

She said 'I do' during a romantic hiking trip after Blair surprised her on a secluded beach.

The duo shared sweet images from their picture-perfect proposal as they celebrated with champagne.

Lily is best known as the mathematician and TV personality from Letters and Numbers.

While the show was cancelled in 2012, repeats are still shown regularly on SBS and it remains a cult favourite.
description: Letters and Numbers presenter Lily Serna has announced she is pregnant with her  first child.
authors: Jess Bell For Daily Mail Australia
